hoteldata.aboutlm: Kolkata, the cultural capital of India, thrives with a rich tapestry of art, literature, and music, enchanting visitors with its grand colonial architecture and bustling streets. From its iconic Howrah Bridge to the aromatic street food delights, Kolkata offers a unique blend of tradition and modernity, making it a captivating destination for all.
hoteldata.hdescription1: Vintage wooden furniture, gorgeous wood panelling, a sun-kissed balcony and a lovely living room with a fireplace
hoteldata.hdescription2: The spacious Deluxe cottage is the ideal choice for a luxurious stay with Royal Hotels in Kolkata
hoteldata.hdescription3: Smart, contemporary styling and assured comfort characterise the elegant Executive Rooms at Royal Hotels.
hoteldata.hmark: Take A Delectable seafood feasts Ride With Us
hoteldata.dmark: Try famous  Macher Jhol, is a flavorful fish curry prepared with a blend of spices, mustard oil, and fresh herbs, leaving a lingering taste that reflects the region's love for seafood.

hoteldata.landmark: A ride to the land of serenity
hoteldata.aboutlm: With an abundance of natural beauty and spellbinding architecture, Bhubaneswar is a must-visit destination. The state capital of Odisha is a sprawling metropolis that very ably preserves the balance between upholding traditional values and cultural heritage on one hand and being able to conform to changing modern times on the other. Bhubaneswar is home to some of the finest temples including the Lingaraja and Mukteswar Temples as well as some of the country's best sporting infrastructure.
hoteldata.hdescription1: Vintage wooden furniture, gorgeous wood panelling, a sun-kissed balcony and a lovely living room with a fireplace
hoteldata.hdescription2: The spacious Deluxe cottage is the ideal choice for a luxurious stay with Royal Hotels in Bhubaneswar
hoteldata.hdescription3: Smart, contemporary styling and assured comfort characterise the elegant Executive Rooms at Royal Hotels.
hoteldata.dmark: Royal Hotel Convention is well decked with various services and facilities that enhance the comfort level of the inhabitants and take care of their corporate get-togethers and social functions in Bhubaneswar. These facilities aim towards taking care of the guests in every possible way. From room facilities to business and leisure facilities; Royal Hotel Convention offers all.

hoteldata.aboutlm: Skirted by azure beaches where sea waves break tide, Jagannath Puri is a confluence of divinity and activity. Whetheryou are on a pilgrimage or in search of a perfect sunrise by the beaches to capture forever, Puri embraces travelers from all walks of life when they walk upon its Grand Road (Bada Danda), which lead to the main Temple of Lord Jagannath.
hoteldata.hdescription1: Vintage wooden furniture, gorgeous wood panelling, a sun-kissed balcony and a lovely living room with a fireplace
hoteldata.hdescription2: The spacious Deluxe cottage is the ideal choice for a luxurious stay with Royal Hotels in Puri
hoteldata.hdescription3: Smart, contemporary styling and assured comfort characterise the elegant Executive Rooms at Royal Hotels.
hoteldata.hmark: Take A Culinary Ride With Us
hoteldata.dmark: A culinary journey like no other ranging from delightful vegetarian options to seafood favourites and classics that have stood the bring home nostalgia like our Aju Baju Chicken and Caramel Custard.

hoteldata.aboutlm: Hyderabad, the City of Pearls, enchants visitors with its majestic architecture, bustling bazaars, and rich cultural heritage, offering a perfect blend of tradition and modernity.Famous for its lip-smacking biryani and iconic Charminar, Hyderabad welcomes everyone with warm hospitality and leaves a lasting impression as a vibrant, cosmopolitan city that beautifully preserves its historical roots.

hoteldata.aboutlm: Royal Hotel Rourkela stands like a restful oasis in the heart of the city and is one of the best luxury hotels in Rourkela. This business hotel in Rourkela was the first hotel that was established by the Mayfair group. And after all these years, it still stands tall as a shining beacon of elegant luxury and excellent hospitality. Whether it is for business or for pleasure, Royal Hotel Rourkela is perfect for both family vacations and corporate tours.
hoteldata.hdescription1: Vintage wooden furniture, gorgeous wood panelling, a sun-kissed balcony and a lovely living room with a fireplace
hoteldata.hdescription2: The spacious Deluxe cottage is the ideal choice for a luxurious stay with Royal Hotels in Rourkela
hoteldata.hdescription3: Smart, contemporary styling and assured comfort characterise the elegant Executive Rooms at Royal Hotels.
hoteldata.hmark: Soul Food In The Steel City
hoteldata.dmark: Royal Hotel Rourkela houses some of the most welcoming restaurants in the city that score a perfect ten on ambience, hospitality, and taste. Serving food that pleases all of your senses and therefore the cuisine at Royal is always delicious as well as nutritious.

hoteldata.aboutlm: Darjeeling is entrenched in old world charm with resplindent views of the mighty Mount Khangchendzonga. The Queen of the Himalayas, Darjeeling, is a quaint little town in the heart of Himalayas, guaranteed to steal your heart!
